text:
Is it possible to make a query that retrieves several names : "&lastname__icontains=jack,john,max,terry" ?
Since these are http requests, I can't find solutions.

Hi Guys, I created an exit pop-up module. What I did is create one session for mouseout and cookies so first visitors can only see the pop-up.  My concern is, is there a way to access the "POST" or Button in the HubsPot Form since this in generated into iFrame. Can that be manipulate using HuBD or something? If yes, wondering if we have documentation for this. Thank you so much guys!

Is there a way to dynamically call a rich text column from hubdb and have it default to the font/inline-styles, not the ones from the WSIWYG editor on HubSpot?

i.e.
```<span style="margin-block-start:0; margin-block-end:0; text-align:left !important; font-size:.75em;">{{ dynamic_page_hubdb_row.specialty }}</span>```
The font is coming through large, not centered, etc.. ignoring all inline styles
I did not understand. can you put some screenshots of the issue?
Sure: the styles on my webpage, are coming from this editor from my hubdb rich text column
Based on the span tag they are in, they should be left-aligned, and smaller
|striptags doesn't work because it removes the <li> formatting and I need that. Is there an alternative?
<@UN0NUBU3S> Do you have any thoughts here?
Am I correctly understanding that you want the HTML pulled from HubDB to _not have any styles_ and instead absorb the styles of the page?

What’s the markup of the HubDB table? I think you should just ensure the source code for that column is generic/non-existent, and then make sure the template CSS for the page contains the proper CSS selectors to target the generic `<li>` elements with the appropriate styling.
It didn’t appear like I could edit the source code in the text editor like normal. Is that option hidden in Hubdb

Hi Neha, 
Have you found anything that could help to achieve the login & signup functionality in HubSpot Websites for any end users ?
Actually I am also looking for the same and not sure whether Membership registration will be the best way to do this.

Regards,
Mohesh Borah
